name: Cyclops Eye-Concept-NoobAi-Epsilon 1.1
description:
Want to support me without Tipping? Here's how:

  1. Liking my posts, collecting my images or collecting my models all generate buzz for me.

  2. Generate more pictures of my models. I get a base commission from anyone who generates using my model, even without the tip.

  3. Leave a like on my model. This helps me with the algorithm in reaching more people

  4. Leave a review. I take all feedback very seriously, good or bad.

  5. Consider using the 'add post' under gallery... if you are posting pictures of just my LoRA. This gives me A LOT of buzz, while you can also complete your daily post quest.

    Thanks Again :)

name: DCAI Girl - NoobAI XL (Œµ‚ÄëPred)
description:
‚¨áÔ∏èÊó•Êú¨Ë™û„ÅØ‰∏ãÈÉ®„Å´„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

This LoRA is the final result of a character LoRA created for the DCAI blog article, ‚ÄúHow to create an original character LoRA [NoobAI XL Training] NoobAI XL Character training‚Äù

Trigger word: dcai-girl, short hair, orange hair, brown eyes, animal ears

Costume: blue dress, skirt, belt, white thighhighs, boots

About LoRA Training

The training was conducted using noobai‚ÄëXL v1.1 eps-pred. At first, 50 base images were created with VRoid Studio, then converted them into two distinct styles using ComfyUI with Animagine XL 4.0, resulting in 100 styled images. These were repeated five times to create a dataset of 500 images in total. Captions were edited using the Dataset Tag Editor in A1111 WebUI.

Training was performed with Kohya_ss GUI, combining the Cosine Annealing learning rate scheduler and the Prodigy optimizer. To further improve quality, training was conducted in bf16 precision with the networks.lora + Convolution configuration. The model was trained with the following parameters: Network Rank (Dimension): 32, Network Alpha: 16, Convolution Rank (Dimension): 32 / Convolution Alpha: 16, Epochs: 5, Total Steps: 2500, and Batch Size: 1.

For more details, please refer to the full blog post.

üî∏üî∏üî∏üî∏üî∏üî∏üî∏

„Åì„ÅÆLoRA„ÅØ„ÄÅDCAI„ÅÆ„Éñ„É≠„Ç∞Ë®ò‰∫ã„Äå„Ç™„É™„Ç∏„Éä„É´„Ç≠„É£„É©„ÇØ„Çø„ÉºLoRA„ÅÆ‰Ωú„ÇäÊñπ„ÄêNoobAI XLÂ≠¶ÁøíÁ∑®„ÄëNoobAI XL„ÅÆ„Ç≠„É£„É©„ÇØ„Çø„ÉºÂ≠¶Áøí„Äç„ÅßÂà∂‰Ωú„Åó„Åü„Ç≠„É£„É©„ÇØ„Çø„ÉºLoRA„ÅÆÊúÄÁµÇÊàêÊûú„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

„Éà„É™„Ç¨„Éº„ÉØ„Éº„ÉâÔºödcai-girl, short hair, orange hair, brown eyes, animal ears

„Ç≥„Çπ„ÉÅ„É•„Éº„É†Ôºöblue dress, skirt, belt, white thighhighs, boots

LoRAÂ≠¶Áøí„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶

Â≠¶Áøí„Å´„ÅØnoobai‚ÄëXL v1.1 eps-pred„Çí‰ΩøÁî®„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„Éô„Éº„Çπ„Å®„Å™„ÇãÁîªÂÉè„ÅØVRoid Studio„Åß50Êûö‰ΩúÊàê„Åó„ÄÅ„Åù„Çå„Çâ„ÇíComfyUI„ÇíÁî®„ÅÑ„Å¶Animagine XL 4.0„Çπ„Çø„Ç§„É´„Å´2„Éë„Çø„Éº„É≥Â§âÊèõ„ÄÇÂêàË®à100Êûö„ÅÆ„Çπ„Çø„Ç§„É´Â§âÊèõÁîªÂÉè„ÇíÁîüÊàê„Åó„ÄÅ„Åù„Çå„Çí5Âõû„É™„Éî„Éº„Éà„Åó„Å¶„ÄÅÊúÄÁµÇÁöÑ„Å´500Êûö„ÅÆÂ≠¶ÁøíÁî®ÁîªÂÉè„ÇíÊßãÁØâ„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ„Ç≠„É£„Éó„Ç∑„Éß„É≥„ÅÆÁ∑®ÈõÜ„Å´„ÅØA1111 WebUI„ÅÆDataset Tag Editor„Çí‰ΩøÁî®„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

„Éà„É¨„Éº„Éã„É≥„Ç∞„ÅØ Kohya_ss GUI „ÇíÁî®„ÅÑ„ÄÅCosine Annealing„Çπ„Ç±„Ç∏„É•„Éº„É©„Éº„Å®Prodigy„Ç™„Éó„ÉÜ„Ç£„Éû„Ç§„Ç∂„Éº „ÅÆÁµÑ„ÅøÂêà„Çè„Åõ„ÅßÂÆüË°å„ÄÇ„Åï„Çâ„Å´„ÄÅbf16„Åß„ÅÆÂ≠¶Áøí„Å®networks.lora + Convolution„ÅÆË®≠ÂÆö„ÇíÂä†„Åà„Å¶ÂìÅË≥™„Ç¢„ÉÉ„Éó„ÇíË©¶„Åø„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇNetwork RankÔºàDimensionÔºâ32 / Network Alpha 16„ÄÅConvolution Rank (Dimension) 32 / Convolution Alpha 16„ÄÅEpochÊï∞5 / Á∑è„Çπ„ÉÜ„ÉÉ„ÉóÊï∞2500 / „Éê„ÉÉ„ÉÅ„Çµ„Ç§„Ç∫1„ÅÆË®≠ÂÆö„ÅßÂ≠¶Áøí„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ

Ë©≥„Åó„Åè„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åú„Å≤„Éñ„É≠„Ç∞Ë®ò‰∫ã„Çí„ÅîË¶ß„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ

name: Simple & Effective (For Illustious/NoobAI Models)
description: After using ComfyUI for a few months, I've finally made a workflow that works for me. It works for Illustrious & NoobAI models. It may look complex at first, but all you need to do is set up the models and add your prompts and let the workflow do the rest. You'll be making detailed images with no issues.

name: Nonomiya Ruri (Hentai: Discipline: Record of a Crusade) NoobAI / IL / Pony / SD1.5
description:
Nonomiya Ruri from Discipline: Record of a Crusade is on NoobAI-XL V-pred / Epsilon / IL / Pony and SD1.5 now!

TAGS:

Nonomiya Ruri, 1girl, green hair, purple eyes, yellow ribbon, hair ribbon,

School uniform:

purple school uniform, two-tone jacket, necktie, pleated skirt, purple thighhighs, yellow trim

black school uniform, black thighhighs

Gym uniform:

Gym uniform, white shirt, name tag, black buruma

Casual clothes:

black shirt, heart cutout, halterneck, miniskirt, pleated skirt, striped thighhighs

Tactical outfit:

blue vest, cargo pants, military, belt, helmet, black boots

Swimsuit:

one-piece swimsuit

NoobAI-XL quality prompt:

Put "masterpiece, best quality, good quality" in positive and put "low quality, worst quality" in negative.

Use euler, cfg 4-6. Don't use higher CFG!

If you have over-constrasted picture and cfg 4-5 didn't help you can try to put in negative "colorful".

More in my articles.

For NoobAI-XL V-pred:

Check my guide about V-pred image generating!

The best model to use V-pred is Cyberfix! But pure NoobAI-XL V-pred is also good.

For Illustrious mixes and NoobAI-XL Epsilon: use NoobAI-Xl Epsilon (especially mixes based on NoobAI-XL Epsilon!).

Guide about NoobAI-XL Epsilon

PonyDiffusion v6 (XL) quality settings:

Style settings for PonyXL before prompt (important):

score_9, score_8_up, score_7_up, score_6_up, uncensored,

Negative prompt for PonyXL (recommended):

dutch angle, censored, watermark, jpeg artifacts, muscular female

SD1.5 quality settings:

masterpiece, high quality

in negative: worst quality, low quality

Upscaler / adetailer settings:

Hires.fix: Upscaler foolhardy_remacri (download and put in "ESRGAN" folder in "models" if you are using automatic1111 or forge).

Hires steps: 12-16

Denoising strength: 0.2-0.3

Adetailer: denoising strength 0.25-0.3. Detection model confident threshhold: 0.7-0.8.

Best sampling methods (with 25-40 sampling steps for txt2img):

  • euler a SGM Uniform, CFG 5-6;

  • euler ancestral CFG++ SGM Uniform / Simple, CFG 1.2-1.5.

You don't need any DPM++.

I will be glad to receive feedback from you and a demonstration of your art with my LoRA!

https://tensor.art/u/604375505701151021

description:
ÂÆâÂêç „É°„É´„Å®„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Äé„Éû„ÇÆ„Ç¢„É¨„Ç≥„Éº„Éâ È≠îÊ≥ïÂ∞ëÂ•≥„Åæ„Å©„Åã‚òÜ„Éû„ÇÆ„Ç´Â§ñ‰ºù„Äè„Å´ÁôªÂ†¥„Åô„Çã„Ç≠„É£„É©„ÇØ„Çø„Éº„Åß„ÅÇ„Çã„ÄÇ

Anna Mel, a character from Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story.

Check out my Magia Record LoRA collection.

LoRA: anna_mel_noobaiXLNAIXL_vPred10Version (unet-only training)

Usage:

This LoRA works well on the dev branch of sd-webui without any additional settings. ComfyUI users need to add a ModelSamplingDiscrete node and set the sampling to 'v_prediction'.

Recommended Weight: 0.7

Trigger Words:

  1. magical girl outfit: anna mel, holding card, tarot

  2. school uniform: anna mel \(school uniform\), black sleeves

  3. winter costume: anna mel \(winter costume\), red skirt, pantyhose

  4. halloween costume: anna mel \(halloween costume\), gloves, medium hair, pantyhose

This LoRA uses the same prompt format as NoobAI and the same tags as Danbooru during its training phase. Therefore, it is recommended to follow NoobAI's prompt format.

Prompt Prefix:

masterpiece, best quality, newest, absurdres, highres, safe,

Negative Prompt:

nsfw, worst quality, old, early, low quality, lowres, signature, username, logo, bad hands, mutated hands, mammal, anthro, furry, ambiguous form, feral, semi-anthro

Caption

1girl, anna mel, magia record: mahou shoujo madoka magica gaiden, <artists>, <special tags>, <general tags>, <other tags>

name: Pink Rococo Dress (for NoobAI)
description:
Pink Rococo Dress (for NoobAI)

This LoRA is for generating a (pink) dress in Rococo style.

Usage

Trigger is only

rococo dress

further tags are usually not needed. The default color is pink, the color can however be influenced with the prompt to some extend. Also other tags that specify a color (like blue eyes) may influence the result.


Trained on NoobAI-EPS1.1.
